title: What is PKU?
creator_credit: Deptartment of Audio Visual Communications, Glaxo Australia
brief_description: PKU is an accumulation of phenylalanine in the blood, which if left unchecked, will cause intellectual disability. Stresses the importance of diet in controlling this disorder.
